data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of KSR Footwear Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from November 27 2025 the Equity Shares of KSR Footwear Ltd (Scrip Code: 544615) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251125-45 dated November 25 2025.
